A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: OMG! #StarWars #TheLastJedi was surprisingly f-ing awesome\, refreshing and better than TFA. One of the best and in line with Rogue One as one of the best\, if not the best\, of all the Star Wars movies ever. Also\, BB-8 is still my favorite character in this sequel trilogy and has the best scenes in the movie. Worth more viewings. Rian Johnson\, you are what Star Wars needs now. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ P.S. Stay for the credits\, because Carrie Fisher will be remembered.
